member.name: P:DiceLib.DiceRoll.NumberOfDice
member.summary: public int property that can be 1 or 2

member.name: P:DiceLib.DiceRoll.Guess
member.summary: public int property if NumberOfDice is 1, then its value is between 1 and 7, otherwise value is between 2 and 12

member.name: P:DiceLib.DiceRoll.Result
member.summary: public property if NumberOfDice is 1, then its value is between 1 and 7, otherwise value is between 2 and 12
